comments.author: senior-dev
comments.body: This method is too long. Please extract the validation logic into a separate private method.

comments.body: Consider adding input validation here to prevent SQL injection. The userId parameter should be sanitized.

comments.body: Why did you choose to use a record here instead of a class? Can you explain the reasoning?
